import logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.DEBUG, format=''''%(levelname)s: %(message)s'''')

import geoextent.lib.extent as extent
result = extent.fromRemote(''''10.5281/zenodo.4593540'''', bbox=True)
print(''''Final bbox:'''', result.get(''''bbox''''))
")

Bash(PYTHONPATH=/home/daniel/git/geoextent python -c "
import geoextent.lib.extent as extent
result = extent.fromFile(''test2.geojson'', bbox=True)
print(''Result bbox:'', result.get(''bbox''))
print(''Result crs:'', result.get(''crs''))
")

Bash(PYTHONPATH=/home/daniel/git/geoextent python -c "
import logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.DEBUG, format=''%(levelname)s: %(message)s'')

import geoextent.lib.extent as extent
result = extent.fromRemote(''10.5281/zenodo.4593540'', bbox=True, ext_metadata=True)
print(''Final bbox:'', result.get(''bbox''))
print(''External metadata:'', result.get(''external_metadata''))
")

Bash(PYTHONPATH=/home/daniel/git/geoextent python -c "
import logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)

import geoextent.lib.extent as extent
result = extent.fromRemote(''10.5281/zenodo.4593540'', bbox=True, ext_metadata=True)
print(''\nFinal bbox:'', result.get(''bbox''))
print(''\nExternal metadata:'')
import json
print(json.dumps(result.get(''external_metadata''), indent=2))
")

Bash(PYTHONPATH=/home/daniel/git/geoextent python -c "
import logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)

from geoextent.lib import external_metadata

# Test with a Zenodo DOI (DataCite)
print(''Testing Zenodo DOI (DataCite):'')
metadata = external_metadata.get_external_metadata(''10.5281/zenodo.4593540'')
import json
print(json.dumps(metadata, indent=2))
")

import logging

from geoextent.lib import external_metadata

# Test with a PANGAEA DOI (should be in DataCite, not CrossRef)
print(''Testing PANGAEA DOI:'')
metadata = external_metadata.get_external_metadata(''10.1594/PANGAEA.909380'')
import json
print(json.dumps(metadata, indent=2))
")
